name: Battle Of The Element
description:
Art: Javier Del Rosario
Programmer: Angelo Sanchez
Music/SoundEFX: Louis Martinez
Graphic: Jerry Mayton

Xbox Control

Player 1: Move - D-pad, A - Light Attack, X - Heavy Attack (when bar is full)
Form Change: Hold LB +X - Fire Mode, +Y - Ice Mode, +B - Earth Mode, +A - Wind Mode

Player 2: Move - D-pad, A - Light Attack, X - Heavy Attack (when bar is full)
Form Change: Hold LB +X - Fire Mode, +Y - Ice Mode, +B - Earth Mode, +A - Wind Mode
